parameters.name: GroupExternalId
parameters.description: The external ID of the group.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the group. If you specify this parameter, the query is based on an exact match.

parameters.name: GroupNameStartsWith
parameters.description: The prefix of the group name. If you specify this parameter, the query follows the leftmost matching principle.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
